title: Server Rules
description: Imaginary Horizons is an community that values dignity, creativity, and diversity. You can find the full version of the server rules below:

fields.name: Give the Benefit of the Doubt
fields.value: Always be prepared to see a conflict as a misunderstanding. Whenever possible, try to hash out these misunderstandings in private messages instead of in public chats. This also means don't intentionally pick fights (eg posting a negative opinion on a game in the middle of other people being excited about it).

fields.name: No Ridicule/Verbal Abuse
fields.value: We value diversity of opinion and expression in this server. Attacking or making fun of people is not productive for that atmosphere. This rule includes excessive trash talk and self-deprecation as well as bigoted terms of any kind.

fields.name: Start Discussions in the Appropriate Channel
fields.value: Please help keep discussion in the server organized by posting in appropriate channels. Political, religious, and philosophical discussion is welcomed in the <#587388714368630806> channel, however bad faith arguments (such as playing devil's advocate) will not be tolerated. As a reminder, other rules are NOT suspended in that channel (ie you still need to **Give the Benefit of the Doubt** and abide by **No Ridicule/Verbal Abuse**).

fields.name: Use Spoiler Tags
fields.value: Surround extreme or sensitive topics as well as story reveals from media with `||` so that Discord hides it by default. Example: `||This is a spoiler||` shows as ||This is a spoiler||.

footer.text: Use /support to learn how to support the server!
